body.name: Organic A2 Toddler Formula – Growth Spurt Easy to Digest Comfort & Gentle Dairy – Lactoferrin, 2'-FL HMO, Prebiotics, Probiotics, DHA, ARA, Methylfolate, Immune Support, Non GMO Baby Transition
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 7 mins
features: IMAGINE A FULL FAT, ORGANIC A2 TODDLER FORMULA THAT IS MODELED AFTER BREASTFEEDING, AND NATURALLY EASIER TO DIGEST THAN THE OTHER LEADING A1 DAIRY AND COW MILK FORMULAS. May provide relief from cow milk protein sensitivity*. Constipation, Congestion, Colic, Gas, Spit Up, Fussiness, Crying, Sensitive Stomach and Digestive Issues can be signs of cow milk sensitivity! Take back your nights with sound sleep! *not suitable for children with cow milk protein allergy.

OVER 20 VITAMINS AND NUTRIENTS FOR HEALTHY GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT. Made with Lactoferrin, 2'FL HMO (Human Milk Oligosaccharide), Prebiotics, Bifidobacteria Probiotics naturally found in breast milk, giving you the highest quality, superior toddler drink formula on the market!

INCLUDES DHA AND ARA AND ABSOLUTELY NO: Maltodextrin, Corn Syrup Solids, Fillers, Palm Oils, Rice Syrup, or Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs). Why would you choose anything else for the good start your child needs?

GREAT TASTING FOR THOSE PICKY EATERS, ensuring a pleasant and fresh feeding experience for children and parents! Discover why Growth Spurt is becoming every parent's choice for the Best Quality Powdered Formula on the Market! Gentle, Comfort, Worry Free!
INCLUDING A SUPERIOR BIOAVAILABLE METHYLFOLATE instead of Folic Acid, a superb Folate option, as well as Methylated B Vitamins for MTHFR!

MANUFACTURED IN THE USA; manufactured in a State-Of-The-Art Facility for guaranteed purity and quality in every drink! Your Growth Spurt Formula is backed by a lifetime money-back guarantee. Period. No questions asked. Click the Orange Button to order now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A2 Milk: SUPERIOR A2 DAIRY FORMULA TO SUPPORT YOUR GROWING TODDLER! Rather than low quality formulas packed with sugars, corn syrups, and fillers, would you like a premium formula designed to be the closest to breast milk, with only the highest quality ingredients? If so, our Growth Spurt Premium A2 Formula is the ideal choice for you and your toddler! Our A2 Formula is specifically formulated to deliver optimal levels of essential vitamins and minerals that are modeled after breast milk, giving your weaning or supplementing child what he or she needs for strong and thriving development, and to guard against deficiencies throughout childhood. Our A2 Formula is a premium toddler formula with a number of key benefits: Naturally easier to digest A2 beta-casein protein formula that can be easier to digest than normal A1 milk based formula.Wide spectrum vitamin and mineral formula helps protect against deficiencies for reinforced body and brain development including a superior bioavailable Methylfolate instead of Folic Acid, and Methyl B Vitamins making it a superb option for MTHFR.Can help alleviate allergies and digestive issues due to Milk Protein Sensitivity.Includes premium ingredients like Full Cream A2 Milk Powder, Lactoferrin, 2'-FL HMO, DHA & ARA, Prebiotics, Bifidobacteria Probiotics and more than 20 important nutrients for growth and development.Has none of the “junk” with absolutely NO: Maltodextrin, Palm Oils, Rice Syrup, Fillers, or Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs). If you would like a premium toddler formula, specifically formulated to promote optimal growth and guard against deficiencies in your thriving toddler, our Growth Spurt Premium A2 Milk Toddler Formula is the perfect choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It smells and taste really good!
reviews.reviewText: I'm so happy to have found this formula. There is truly something positively different about it, compared to the other popular formulas that has a very bad smell and metallic taste, which alway constipates and make our babies sick, Growth Sprut is very gentle with my baby's tummy. I tried it and I enjoy it the formula too. My breast-fed toddler didnt push away his bottle this time. He loved Growth Sprut formula, and that made me sooooo happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small business!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great small business to support! They are here to support you and babies needs! So many different options for each individual baby. Shop small and help this great company flourish!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 12 month old LOVES this stuff!!
reviews.reviewText: This product is a perfect for young toddlers with a sensitive stomach. My toddler is picky about her milks, she drank an entire 8 oz with no complaints or spit up after! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GAME CHANGER! A Gentle Solution for Happy Tummies!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this baby formula for my little one, and it has been a game-changer! The gentle formula is easy on their tummy, and I've noticed a positive difference in their overall well-being. Highly recommend for fellow parents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality formula for a fair price! Packed full of vitamins, nutrients, and other goodies. It shipped quickly. Plus, I like the packaging- creative, clear, and easy to read. And the little superhero cow? Super cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and fast delivery
reviews.reviewText: This formula was delivered in a timely manner. My infant loved it. Would definitely purchase again. Packaging was bright and fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product is great has so many benefits & came very quickly :) I’d recommend to anyone out there !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We’re so glad we found this formula!
reviews.reviewText: We’re so happy to find a clean formula with none of the junk in it. If you’re a parent that takes your kid’s health seriously, this is it! Shipping was fast also, highly recommended! 5/5
